UsageEntitlementBucket.name: UsageEntitlementBucket
UsageEntitlementBucket.description: Represents a usage entitlement that's granted with the sellable product.

BucketBalance.description: The balance of the usage entitlement bucket after each transaction.

BucketBalanceUomId.description: The unit that's used to measure the usage entitlement bucket balance.

CompletedRollovers.description: The number of rollovers that were completed for the entitlements.

ConsumedEntitlement.description: The entitlements that have been consumed from this bucket.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the usage entitlement bucket period ends.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the usage entitlement bucket becomes effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the usage entitlement bucket record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the usage entitlement bucket.

ParentId.description: The parent record that's associated with the usage entitlement bucket.

TotalAsOfBalance.description: The balance of the entitlements granted with the usage resource for a Usage entitlement account.

TotalConsumedEntitlement.description: The entitlements that have been consumed from this bucket.

TransactionUsageEntitlementId.description: The transaction usage entitlement associated with this usage entitlement bucket.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource that's associated with the usage entitlement bucket.
